item.title: Vlan Configuration in Mikrotik Interface Vlan vs Bridge Vlan
item.description: Overview MikroTik supports VLAN implementation at both Layer 2 (Switching) and Layer 3 (Routing). Correctly distinguishing Interface VLAN and Bridge VLAN is essential for proper network segmentation, routing, and management. Interface VLAN (L3 VLAN Interface) Description An Interface VLAN is a logical Layer 3 interface created on top of a physical interface or bridge. It is used to assign IP addresses and route traffic for a specific VLAN. Purpose Provide IP addressing to VLANs
